name: Operation Blood
overview: Operation Blood is a first-person shooter. The player has to rescue imprisoned scientists. The protagonist, Captain Gamow, faces the enemy in six missions: military base, forest, village natives, the ammunition, internment camp, airport. The game is based on the targeting of sight enemies on the screen. Player can use a rifle, grenades and power ups that appear on screen. During the fight with the enemy, such as soldiers, helicopters and armored vehicles, player has be wary of hostages, civilians or paramedics. Two versions of the game exists, the only difference being whether the game supports light gun or not.
